app.title: Google Indexing Web UI
app.description: A tool for managing Google indexing

auth.emailPlaceholder: Enter email to sign up or login

errors.oauthCallback: Google authentication callback failed. Please check your Google account settings or try again later
errors.oauthSignin: Google sign-in failed. Please try again later
errors.callback: Authentication callback processing failed. Please try again later
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later

apps.title: Apps
apps.name: Name
apps.checkConnection: Please check database connection and try again
apps.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected apps? This action will also delete all related logs and cache data, and cannot be undone.
apps.invalidJsonFormat: Service account key must be a valid JSON format
apps.domainHelp: Enter the domain name to be indexed, without http:// or https://
apps.appEmailHelp: Service account email obtained from Google API Console
apps.jsonKeyHelp: Paste the JSON credentials file content of your Google Search Console service account here

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

logs.title: Indexing History
logs.batchIdDesc: Unique identifier for an indexing task
logs.totalDesc: Total number of URLs processed in this task
logs.indexedDesc: Number of URLs successfully indexed by Google
logs.submittedDesc: Number of URLs submitted to Google but not yet indexed
logs.crawledDesc: Number of URLs crawled by Google but not yet indexed
logs.errorDesc: Number of URLs that failed to process

indexing.title: Indexing
indexing.urlsPlaceholder:
Enter specific URLs to index, one per line. For example:
https://example.com/page1
https://example.com/page2

If left empty, the system will automatically fetch all URLs from Sitemap

errors.selectApp: Please select an app to index
